actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the privilege of Senators and Representatives from arrest for traffic offenses in going to and returning from a session of their respective Houses.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that Senators and Representatives shall not be privileged from arrest for traffic offenses in going to and returning from a session of Congress.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the privilege of Senators and Representatives from arrest for traffic offenses in going to and returning from a session of their respective Houses.
